title: Seeing a fetus in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Therefore, the viewer presses to search for an interpretation of his vision to find out whether the vision is good or not, and this we will learn in detail from a translated website in the following article. As follows: An unmarried girl who sees a fetus in a dream indicates that she will hear happy and joyful news during the coming period, God willing. As for an unmarried girl who sees a fetus in her stomach and feels its movement, this dream was a sign of achieving goals, desires and ambitions and achieving what she wants and seeks. Rather, the unmarried girl seeing a fetus in her stomach and feeling its movement and the presence of pain as a result of the movement in the dream. The dream was an indication that he committed transgressions, sins and immorality. This vision warns its owner to stay away from forbidden things and get closer to God. The fetus in the unmarried girl’s dream could be a sign. On the death of someone close to her. The deceased may be her friend or a member of her family, and God knows best. The presence of a fetus in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates his transition to a new stage in his life. He will have great wealth and a great life, and he will live a happy and luxurious life later, God willing. The presence of a fetus in the belly of an unmarried girl and her belly growing in a dream was an indication of the approaching date of her marriage, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that the fetus has died in her womb, this is a sign that she will be exposed to problems and obstacles that threaten her life. It also leads to a psychological condition. Bad and these problems will soon end. See also: The experiences of a pregnant woman with dreams. The interpretation of seeing a fetus in a dream for a married woman. The meaning of seeing a fetus in a married woman’s dream differs from other indications such as: A married woman saw a fetus in a dream and gave birth to children in reality. The dream was an indication that He will obtain a lot of goodness and money in the coming days, God willing. Whereas if a married woman sees in a dream that she is carrying a fetus in her stomach, but in reality she has not given birth to children. As the dream was good news that she will become pregnant soon, God willing. If a married woman sees that a fetus is in her stomach Female, this vision indicates that she is pregnant with a boy. However, if the fetus in her womb is male, this is evidence that she will soon give birth to a girl, God willing. A married woman’s miscarriage in a dream was a sign of instability in her married life. She did not enjoy a happy married life and it exposed her to problems and difficulties. And family disputes that may lead to separation or divorce. But if a married woman saw that the fetus had died in her womb, then this vision was a sign of her husband’s kindness and abundant livelihood. He will also receive a promotion in his job and reach a prominent and high position in the coming days, God willing. Interpretation Seeing a fetus in a man’s dream and its meaning Seeing a fetus is one of the most promising visions for a married man and its effects are as follows: A fetus in a married man’s dream indicates that he will obtain a good livelihood and a lot of money. Or that he will reach a prestigious position by working...

title: A dark blue dress in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: In the following lines, we will examine with you from our website gptafser.com/ the negative and positive meanings of seeing a blue dress in a woman’s dream and the different interpretations of the color blue in a man’s dream, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing a dark blue dress in a dream for a single girl. The dark blue dress in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates a calm nature. A calm personality and a love of solitude. Feeling dissatisfied with the appearance of a blue dress in a dream is evidence that the dreamer wants to change her life radically. It was said that the blue dress was an announcement of marriage. As for the long dress, it symbolizes her purity and commitment to the teachings of her religion, and God knows best. The loose blue dress in The dream indicates that the dreamer enjoys a spacious life and a life of luxury and prosperity, and God knows best. It is said that the color blue in an unmarried woman’s dream is good news about her plan from the person she loves soon. Buying many blue dresses in a dream is a sign of good luck and success in life. Dark blue in a dream is undesirable and indicates confusion, anxiety, and a feeling of psychological distress, and God knows best. It is said that a short blue dress in a dream indicates a love of freedom, violating restrictions, and ignoring social customs and traditions. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a pink dress for pregnant women, single and married women. Interpretation of seeing a blue dress Dark in a dream for a married woman: A dark blue dress in a married woman’s dream means that you will hear some sad news in the coming period. Wearing a dark blue dress in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will face some marital problems. In contrast to the dark blue dress comes a light-colored dress. Be Good news and optimism, and positive things will happen soon. Taking off a dark blue dress in a dream is evidence of getting rid of problems, removing worries, and starting over, God willing. Wearing a long blue dress in a dream is a sign of covering up, ending marital disputes, and peace, and God knows best. A blue dress decorated with flowers in a dream is a sign of Good news of optimism. Achieving long-awaited dreams and participating in happy occasions in the coming days. The color blue in a dream expresses stability, a happy married life, spaciousness of life, and peace of mind, and God knows best. Seeing the walls of a house painted blue in a dream, this indicates expanding means of livelihood, increasing... Money, the blessing of children and the best of their circumstances. Seeing blue bed covers and curtains in a dream is a sign of goodness and abundant blessings. The husband’s blue clothes are a sign of his promotion at work. Interpretation of seeing a dark blue shirt in a dream about a man and its meaning When he sees a sleeping man, it is as if he is wearing A blue shirt. It is a sign of his good luck, and that he will soon hear a lot of good news. Blue pants in a man’s dream indicate the visionary’s excellence in his field of work and achieving a high position among his colleagues. Blue clothes in general in a man’s dream symbolize perseverance, enthusiasm, and love of work And dedication to achieving goals, and God knows best

title: Interpretation of a dream about chicken by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretations of a dream about chicken: It has many connotations and meanings for dreamers and makes them desperate to know it. In the following article, we will discuss the most important information about this topic in a clear and simple way, so let’s read below. Interpretations of a dream about chicken: The dreamer’s dream of white chicken indicates that his future partner will be characterized by many good qualities that will make him very happy in the future. His life is with her. If one sees a chicken in his dream, this is a sign of many accomplishments that he will be able to achieve that will make him feel very happy. In the event that the dreamer sees a live chicken during his sleep, this indicates that he is well dedicated to the responsibilities assigned to him and is ready to perform them to the fullest. The dreamer seeing in a dream the sound of a chicken and it bothering him indicates that many unpleasant things will happen around him, making him feel very upset. Interpretation of a dream about chicken by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer who sees chicken in a dream as evidence of his ability to achieve many things that he has dreamed of for a long time , and this will make him very happy. If a person sees a chicken in his dream, this represents the achievements that he will achieve in his professional life, which will help him occupy a special position in his profession. If the dreamer sees chickens in his dream while he is not married, this indicates that he has found the girl who suits him and proposes Marry her immediately. Seeing the dreamer catching a chicken in his dream indicates that he is very keen on earning his money through legitimate means and avoiding crooked and malicious ways. Interpretation of the dream of chicken according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi interprets the dreamer’s vision of chicken in a dream as an indication that he will undertake many of the responsibilities entrusted to him to the fullest. Face.If one sees a chicken in his dream, this is a sign of his good qualities that make him very popular with many around him and makes them want to get close to him.If the dreamer sees during his sleep being touched by a chicken, this means that he is sick, which will make him very painful and very tired. Seeing chickens in his home in a dream means that he will get a lot of money that will enable him to improve his standard of living. Interpretation of a dream about one chicken: Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream about chickens indicates her ability to achieve many things that she has dreamed of for a long time, and she will be proud of herself for that. If During his sleep, the dreamer saw live chickens, this indicates that she will get into a big problem that she will not be able to get rid of easily at all. If the dreamer sees chickens in her dream very close to her, this means that she has received a marriage proposal from a young man who is suitable for her and she will accept him immediately. Vision A girl seeing a brown chicken in her dream symbolizes that she will get a job opportunity that she has always dreamed of and this will make her very happy. Interpretation of a dream about a chicken for a married woman: Seeing a married woman in a dream with a raw chicken means that she is having a lot of disagreements with her husband at that time and this prevents her from feeling comfortable in her life. If the dreamer sees a chicken while she is sleeping and cooking it, this is a sign of the happy life she enjoys with her husband and children and her wish that nothing will spoil their lives. If the dreamer sees

title: Interpretation of seeing someone wearing a hat

preview.html: Therefore, the dream must be interpreted in accordance with the specified basic principles and in accordance with the Holy Qur’an and the Noble Prophet’s Sunnah. The meaning of a dream of wearing a hat for a married womanThe meaning of seeing a hat in a dream for a married woman can be clarified through the following: A married woman who sees a hat in a dream is good news about happiness with Her husband and the stability of married life and the absence of any strong problems between them. It can be evidence that she has a high status with her husband, and that he loves her and wants to make her happy, and it can also be evidence of the good luck that she will have in the coming season by God’s will. If a woman sees The married woman herself is wearing a hat on her head and it is new, so this is good news for the abundance of wealth and money. Seeing a hat in general in a dream is a sign of security, satisfaction and happiness in life, goodness and living with money and work. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a hat for a pregnant woman A pregnant woman can have many visions and dreams that can To be dreams or a sign, so we will interpret the dream as follows: Seeing the owner of the hat is good news of God’s will for you. The approaching date of childbirth may please you, and it will be easy and without complications. Seeing the hat of a pregnant child in a dream is a sign of happy events that will pass In it. See also: Interpretation of dreams about wearing the hijab for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a hat for a single woman. An unmarried woman who sees a hat in a dream has many signs and meanings, and they are as follows: An unmarried woman who sees a hat in a dream is a sign of sustenance and kindness in the near future by order From God Almighty. The good news may be that she will marry a good man and feel stable in her life. For a single woman to see in a dream the presence of a young man wearing a hat is evidence of her feelings of humility and shame in her life. Also, seeing that he is wearing a white hat is good news of prosperity and kindness and that he will hear Soon happy news. A white hat can be a harbinger of achieving goals and desires that she wants to achieve in her life. An unmarried woman seeing a hat in black may be an unpleasant vision and it can be a sign that some unpleasant events will happen and she will be sad for some time. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a hat For a manWhat does it mean to see a young man’s hat in a dream? To find out, follow along with us: If a young man sees himself in a dream wearing a hat on his head, this is a harbinger of happiness, good food, and a lot of money soon. He sees for himself that the hat he is wearing is beautiful and does not want to change it. It is good news for psychological stability and for him to obtain many true and correct opinions. A young man sees himself wearing a dirty hat. It is the unstable life he lives. It also indicates that he feels unstable and unable to make good decisions in his life. The elegant hat that fits the young man in the dream is evidence of his superiority in education and many different aspects of life. A young man who sees himself wearing a hat that resembles a hat is a warning of poverty. In addition to seeing himself wearing a hat

title: Interpretation of seeing beans in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: What is the interpretation of beans in a dream? Interpretation of seeing beans in a dream What is the meaning of seeing green beans? Is it bad to see dry beans? What did officials say about seeing baked beans? What signs do you see when you plant and harvest grains? By reading this article, you will learn about the most important signs of your dream, follow them below. Do you have a confused dream? what are you waiting for; Google is an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Beans in a dream. He said that the jurists differed greatly in their interpretation of the symbol of Nabulsi beans. If the beans are dry and uncooked, this symbolizes the arrival of money and livelihood, knowing that the money that the dreamer obtains will increase from time to time, and perhaps the dream is interpreted as a new job and a door to livelihood. Which increases the money and the financial situation of the visionaries will stabilize. Ibn Shaheen said that if the fortuneteller sees a few beans in a dream, he does not suffer from many worries, but rather it is difficult in his life, and after that sadness and anxiety will disappear. But if the dreamer sees large quantities of beans, this indicates Disappointment, oppression, and many problems. If the dreamer finds a bag full of beans in his home and throws it away in the dream, this is sadness that has clouded his life and made him long for comfort and stability, and soon this pain will end and the dreamer will be able to solve his problems and expel them from his life. Beans in a dream by Ibn Sirin, in some Ibn Sirin explained that the seed symbolizes money and livelihood, but will this money come quickly or will the dreamer become miserable until he obtains it? Ibn Sirin continued the interpretation of this dream and said that dry beans are interpreted as livelihood. As for green beans, it is fatigue, sadness, and many worries that will exhaust the dreamer and make him feel hopeless and limited. When an unemployed person dreams that he bought a small amount of beans and was happy with them, God will bless him with the blessing of work and he will soon find a new job to live and begin a new and hidden life. When The dreamer cooks a quantity of beans in his dream, then this is sadness and extreme poverty that befalls him, and if he spills the beans that he cooked in the dream and does not eat from them, then his life will change and he will live. In safety and stability. Beans in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried woman meets her fiancé in a dream and they eat cooked beans together, they will soon leave each other. But if she sees herself distributing beans to people in a dream, and sees them eating from them, then this is evidence of the abundance of her livelihood due to the charity that she gives. She gives it to the poor and needy. If the dreamer loves to eat all kinds of beans while she is awake and sees that she eats more of them in the dream, then this scene heralds the arrival of goodness and happiness in her life. When an unmarried woman receives a bag of dry beans from her fiancé, this indicates a happy marriage between them. If the dreamer gets green beans from her fiancé or from a familiar young man in the dream, but they do not have an emotional relationship, then this is evidence of harm and a major problem between the dreamer and this person. Some jurists said: If an unmarried woman cooks...

title: Interpretation of a dream about leaving home

preview.html: If the dreamer is looking for a place to go in the dream after leaving the house, this means that he did not think about his affairs and decisions during this period, and if he leaves his house while he is sad, this indicates that he has a great debt in life. Interpretation of seeing leaving the house in a dream for a single girl If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is leaving her house in a dream and feels very happy in the dream. This indicates that she will be able to get rid of the problems and fears that she is going through in this period of her life, and God knows best. And seeing an unmarried girl who was thinking a lot about leaving her house in a dream, and she could not do so in the dream. This is an indication that there are big and difficult things that this single girl is going through in her life at this time, and God knows best. And if the unmarried woman looks at her house, says goodbye, and goes to another place in the dream, and feels sad. The meaning indicates that this single girl will face many bad things in her life and during this period. And if the unmarried girl sits in a house other than her house after leaving it in a dream, this is not good in the dream. It explains that she suffers from a great distraction in her thinking during this time, and that this matter It saddens her a lot, and God is the highest and most knowledgeable. title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person taking clothes from a living person

preview.html: But if the dreamer sees that he sees the dead taking the clothes of the living, what is the interpretation of this dream? Through the website gptafser.com/ we will provide the interpretation of seeing the dead taking clothes from the living with all the details. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person taking clothes from the living in a dream about a single girl. Seeing an unmarried girl wearing the deceased wearing new clothes in a dream, she will have a lot of happiness and God will hear the good news. While if an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is giving the deceased old, flimsy clothes, these may be some of the problems that she will face in reality, and God knows best. If the unmarried girl is suffering from some psychological problems that are happening in her life, and she sees in a dream that she is getting clothes. New from a dead person and she was happy about it. Great positive changes will occur and all problems will turn into happiness and joy thanks to God Almighty. Seeing the dead wearing new clothes and being happy with them can be interpreted in a dream for an unmarried girl. The deceased wants to send her a specific message, perhaps about his family members. But if he knows him, this is a sign of many good opportunities that the dreamer will receive. The deceased took white clothes from a girl in a dream. This means that she will marry someone who respects and loves her, and she will achieve achievements and successes in her life. See also: Interpretation of the dead giving money to a married woman. Interpretation of a dream A dead person takes clothes from a living person in a dream about a married woman. When a married woman dreams that she is giving clothes to a dead person in her family. The vision may indicate the existence of a strong relationship between the deceased and the dreamer, and God knows best. Whereas if a married woman sees that she is giving the deceased old clothes and does not want to kiss them in the dream This means that she is doing some wrong things in her life, and God knows best. In the event that a married woman faces some marital problems and sees the deceased wearing her new clothes and they were white in the dream. This indicates the end of all the problems surrounding him and the end of everything that bothers him. Interpretation of seeing the dead wearing clothes Black in a married woman’s dream. It indicates the presence of problems or something similar that disturbs the loud vision and that God is the Most High, the All-Knowing. It may mean that seeing the dead taking the clothes of those she loves in a married woman’s dream. She will undergo some renewals and changes in her next life. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a dead person taking Clothes from the living in a dream about a man and its meaning. As for seeing a dead person taking the clothes of a married man in a dream, it is one of the dreams that indicate the expansion of livelihood and the abundance of money. Seeing the dead wearing old clothes in a married man’s dream is a sign of entering into a major problem, but it is easy to solve, and God knows best. While he saw the deceased wearing white clothes and was pleased with them in a dream for a married man. It indicates the stability and happiness that the husband feels in waking life. A case in which a married man was going through a financial crisis and saw that a dead person had come to Arafat. He gave him new white clothes, and he was The dead person and the dreamer are in a state of contentment and happiness in the dream. It is one of the promising dreams that shows the great positives that will happen to the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing dead people

title: Interpretation of seeing a dead father sick in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a sick dead father in a dream. It indicates many different meanings and connotations that vary depending on the individual’s social status in real life, in addition to the individual’s psychological state and the course of the dream, and the dream is interpreted between happy, sad, and unhappy meanings. Seeing a sick dead father in a dream Seeing a dead father In a dream, suffering from an illness is an indication of many problems and obstacles that the dreamer faces and finds it difficult to escape from safely, in addition to the emergence of many negative things that affect his stability. Life. Dreaming of a deceased father who is suffering from an illness in a dream indicates that the dreamer is suffering from a health problem and is unable to live a normal life again, and the dream is a sign that he has lost some valuable things in his heart and lack of compensation. Dreaming of a sick, dead father in a dream Evidence of the continuation of worries, sorrows, and suffering from many complex problems that the dreamer is going through in his current life, in addition to the material and moral crisis. Seeing a sick dead father in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a dead father in a dream as evidence of the sadness and unhappiness that the dreamer is suffering from in reality. In addition to entering a difficult period in which he loses many important things that are difficult to regain. If a married woman suffering from infertility sees her deceased father sick in a dream, this indicates many health problems that she faces in real life, regardless of the difficulty of getting pregnant in this period. Time.To dream of a sick, dead father in an unmarried girl’s dream, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, is an indication of the many problems she faces in her love life and leads to her separation from her lover and a state of storage and hoarding. And depression. Seeing a sick dead father in a single woman’s dream. When a single woman dreams of a dead father in a girl’s dream, he is sick, and it is an indication of the obstacles that the dreamer is going through in reality, in addition to his suffering from many crises, whether in practical reality or in personal life, and he faces great difficulty in that. . amendment. To them. Dreaming of a sick dead father in a dream about an unmarried person indicates the deceased’s need for prayer and zakat, which will alleviate his suffering in the afterlife and raise his status to God Almighty, in addition to the unmarried person’s need for support and assistance. Dreaming of a sick, dead father in a dream indicates qualities The bad nature that characterizes the dreamer and makes him hated by everyone, except that he follows the path of sins and desires, and commits many mistakes without thinking. Seeing a sick dead father in a married woman’s dream. Seeing a sick dead father in a married woman’s dream is evidence of deficiencies in her home and a lack of interest in her husband and children. Aside from the violent behavior that makes her hated by everyone, she must confront herself and work to correct the mistakes. The dream of a dead father who is suffering from an illness, in a woman’s dream, indicates the many marital disputes that she is currently experiencing that cannot be resolved or overcome, and things may develop between the spouses and end up in a divorce.

Dreaming of a dead sick father in a dream about an unmarried person indicates the deceased's need for prayer and zakat that alleviate his suffering in the afterlife and raise his status to God Almighty, in addition to the unmarried person's need for support and help. Dreaming of a sick dead father in a dream indicates the bad qualities that the dreamer has and make him hated by everyone, but he walks the path of sins and lusts, and commits many mistakes without thinking. Seeing a dead sick father in a married woman's dream Seeing a sick dead father in a married woman's dream is evidence of shortcomings in her home and lack of interest in her husband and children, regardless of the violent behaviors that make her hated by everyone and she must confront herself and work to correct the mistakes. title: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Najm in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi.

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Najm in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Among the dreams that carry many meanings, associations, and messages for people are dreams in which verses from the Qur’an appear, and these dreams are repeated. Among the people who constantly read and memorize the Holy Qur’an, among the surahs that repeatedly ask about the interpretation of their vision in a dream, Surat Al-Najm carries many lessons, useful stories and divine commands, so in this article you will read and learn together the interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Najm in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Shirin and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surah Al-Najm in a dream. Interpretation by Ibn Sirin, the famous dream interpreter Ibn Sirin, that seeing the Qur’an in general is a sign of goodness and good news for God Almighty for the dreamer’s comfort, and the Qur’an is one of these matters. An indication of the dreamer’s repentance and return from sins and disobedience, and his progress in the path of God Almighty. As for seeing Surat Al-Najm in a dream, it says: Good news that the major will have a son who will be distinguished by his beauty and stature and who will be fair to him and in good morals and religion. , God willing.Interpretation of Surat Al-Najm in a dream Interpretation by Al-NabulsiAl-Nabulsi agrees with Ibn Sirin’s interpretation because he believes that whoever sees in a dream that he is reading Surat Al-Najm, or finds someone reading Surat Al-Najm in a dream, and then sees him, his birth Surah appears. A good son is characterized by piety and piety, and he walks in the path of God and has a good ending. Al-Nabulsi adds that if this boy is on a trip or abroad, then seeing Surat Al-Najm is evidence that God Almighty will recognize the eye of the seer when his son returns home again. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Najm in a dream for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream Surat Al-Najm is a sign of the great good that this girl will obtain in this world, and it is also good news that God will accept her repentance. In some cases, an unmarried girl seeing Surah Al-Najm in a dream is a sign that she will enjoy With a happy life close to God Almighty, walking in His path, avoiding deception and committing disobedience and disobedience. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surah Al-Najm in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman seeing Surah Al-Najm in a dream means that she will give birth to a son of beauty, piety, and great piety, if she reads the surah in her dream with reverence. Seeing Surat Al-Najm in a dream for a married woman who does not expect to become pregnant is evidence of her closeness to God Almighty and the acceptance of her repentance and that she will achieve goodness in this world and the hereafter, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Najm in a dream for a pregnant womanFor a pregnant woman who finds herself reading Surat Al-Najm in a dream or if she sees Whoever reads it to her, this is a sign that her fetus is male and that God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. It is also considered a sign of good morals and the beauty of her child. A pregnant woman’s recitation of the Qur’an generally indicates the great good that she will obtain in this world and the state of comfort that God gives her and that she will overcome the pain and problems of pregnancy and enjoy health. And wellness, God willing. Many events that are impossible or impossible to occur in reality can appear in dreams, and a person can do

title: Interpretation of a dream about crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Crying in a dream is one of the visions that arouse the dreamers’ anxiety and curiosity for fear of conveying evil to their dreamer, but dream interpreters have indicated that the vision does not in all cases show evil, and it also carries a number of positive meanings, so today via On our website we will point out the most important interpretations. Crying in a dream. Crying in a dream. Crying intensely in a dream about being slapped. The vision here never bodes well, because it symbolizes that the dreamer will fall into a big problem that is difficult to deal with. Crying in a dream is evidence that something will happen to the dreamer that he never expected. If Seeing intense crying in a dream usually indicates that good intentions prevail in the dreamer’s life and that he will be able to overcome all the problems that are bothering him at the moment. Seeing him crying in a dream is a sign that the dreamer’s life will be filled with a lot of joy, and this means that he will receive On a great deal of happy news that will change his life for the better. Crying in a low voice in a dream is a sign that the dreamer has to hide his sadness all the time and never wants to share what he is going through with anyone because he sees that there is no person he can completely trust. When a person sees In a dream, he is crying, but at the same time he hears verses of the Holy Qur’an. This indicates that whoever sees the vision is pure in heart, no matter what his sin, he knows. The necessity of returning to the path of God Almighty. As for whoever sees himself crying loudly and at the same time wearing a black dress, the vision here carries more than one meaning. Crying from the grave is evidence that the dreamer feels deep remorse for the sins he has recently committed. Crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin revealed Imam Ibn Sirin gave a number of interpretations of seeing crying in a dream, which are as follows: Crying in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is currently suffering from an accumulation of responsibilities and burdens and is unable to complain to anyone, so he finds it better to complain to God Almighty, because He is able to remove this sadness. Intense crying in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is going through a difficult time and does not find anyone to help him. In general, the vision indicates that he is facing many crises and problems that the dreamer cannot confront. Intense crying in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is currently feeling distressed and sad because he was unable to achieve Any of his goals. Screaming out of fear of God Almighty is evidence of his repentance and the beginning of the path to joy, but it is important that despair does not control the dreamer. Crying in a dream usually indicates closing the page of the past and opening a new one. Crying in a dream for a single woman. Crying with cold tears in a dream for a woman Unmarried is a sign that she will get married soon, and she will also be saved from all her troubles and sorrows that have beset her for a long time. Crying in a woman’s dream without a sound or a moan is evidence that she will enter into a new emotional relationship in the coming days, knowing that this relationship will be the main reason. For her happiness. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream crying loudly with slaps and screams, this is evidence of her psychological struggles and the oppression she is experiencing.
